ing: 4 cups chocolate ice cream (such as Dreyer'sÂ®)
1/3 cup hot fudge sauce, or more to taste
8 chocolate sandwich cookies (such as OreoÂ®), chopped
1 (1.4 ounce) bar chocolate-covered toffee candy bar (such as HeathÂ®), chopped
des: "Here's a take on a favorite BlizzardÂ® treat, made at home and even better! Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles and prepare for eye-rolling delight!"
ins:
Place 4 highball glasses in the freezer to chill.
Place chocolate ice cream in a bowl; churn with an electric mixer on low speed until softened, 15 to 20 seconds. Drizzle fudge sauce over the surface of the ice cream. Scatter chocolate sandwich cookies, toffee candy, and brownie chunks evenly on top; fold in with a spatula.
Scoop chocolate ice cream mixture into the chilled glasses.
